featured.text: Once the pests detect the chemical fog in the room, they’ll hide themselves in walls or other hideaways, where you’ll never be able to treat them effectively.

definition.zh_def: 霧；一種由水滴或冰晶懸浮在空氣中形成的低雲，通常使能見度降低。
definition.en_def: A thick cloud of tiny water droplets or ice crystals suspended in the atmosphere, reducing visibility.
definition.example: The fog made it difficult to see the road ahead.
